triples.name: Backstepping
triples.relevance: The paper extends traditional backstepping techniques to handle output modeling error, which prevents direct application of standard backstepping.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Adaptive control is the foundational technique that the proposed robust adaptive control scheme builds upon.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper addresses control of nonlinear systems, which requires specialized nonlinear control techniques.

triples.name: Robust control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new robust adaptive control scheme that handles unknown disturbances and modeling errors.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: Lyapunov stability analysis is the key theoretical tool used to establish stability of the proposed control scheme.
